articles.title: I Just Stood Up And Clapped After Merriam-Webster Said This In Their New Ad
articles.author: Bella Arnold
articles.summary: Merriam-Webster released an advertisement in 2025 that parodies AI language models. The company is launching the 12th edition of its collegiate dictionary in November. The ad cleverly positions the dictionary as "actual intelligence" against the backdrop of artificial intelligence.

articles.title: 33 Shoes So Good You'll Plan Entire Outfits Around Them
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Various shoe companies and brands are launching new products, including lace-up combat boots, machine-washable flats, suede clogs, waterproof Chelsea boots, Frye-inspired boots, velcro sneakers, JW Pei mule sandals, Steve Madden sneakers, Ugg-inspired platform boots, Rothy's lace-up sneakers, and more.  These new shoes cater to different styles, comfort levels, and price points, offering consumers a wide range of choices for various occasions.

articles.title: The most annoying antivirus just launched an AI browser, and it's much better than I expected
articles.author: Gavin Phillips
articles.summary: Norton has launched Norton Neo, a Chromium-based browser with AI features, including a Magic Box that combines search and an AI chatbot. Norton Neo also offers smart tab groupings and a Peek feature for previewing links. The browser is noted for its speed and support for extensions.

articles.title: Your team can chat with Anthropic's Claude directly in Slack now - what it can do
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: A new chatbot has been introduced to enhance workflow. Its availability is currently limited to a specific group of users.

articles.title: Slideshow: New products from The J.M. Smucker Co., Junkless and Idahoan Foods
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: New protein products are being introduced.

articles.title: Dessert Lovers Are Losing It Over Yasso's New ‘Ridiculously Creamy' Fro-Yo Treat: 'I'm Crying'
articles.author: Lauren Murphy
articles.summary: Yasso has launched a new product line called Spoonables, which are 14oz tubs of spoonable frozen Greek yogurt. This new line comes in five flavors: Mint Chocolate Chip, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, Fudge Brownie, Cookies 'n Cream and Coffee Chip, and is available at select Target locations. Each tub contains up to 19 grams of protein and around 400 calories.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works Is Selling a Surprising New Home Essential for Under $5 and Shoppers Say They're ‘Sold'
articles.author: Dengarden
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works has launched a new line of dryer sheets, expanding their fabric care line. These dryer sheets come in popular scents like Mahogany Teakwood, Cactus Blossom, Sundrenched Linen, and Lavender Vanilla. They are currently on sale for $4.77 per box of 40 sheets.

articles.title: Dyson futuristic Supersonic r hair dryer adorned in new Amber Silk color
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a new Amber Silk colorway for its Supersonic r hair dryer. The hair dryer, priced at $649.99, features a Streamlined Flow Heater for even heat distribution and magnetically designed attachments for various hair types and styles.

articles.title: Fresh Vintage Farms launches Almond Oil Mayo With Breast Cancer Awareness event
articles.summary: Fresh Vintage Farms, a California-based family company, has introduced its new Almond Oil Mayo. This mayonnaise is crafted with cold-pressed almond oil, providing a heart-healthy alternative to traditional spreads.

articles.title: I replaced my iPhone with a 22,000mAh Android for a week - and I didn't ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Doogee's S200 Max offers extreme durability and performance.

articles.title: ChatGPT and Shopify Are Teaming Up: You Can Now Buy Directly Inside ChatGPT
articles.author: Rukayat Badmus
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with Shopify to launch Instant Checkout, a new feature integrated into ChatGPT. This feature enables users to make purchases directly within the chat interface, starting with Etsy and then expanding to Shopify stores. Merchants will pay OpenAI a commission for sales made through Instant Checkout.

articles.title: Best Fried Donuts: 6 Restaurant Chains You'll Love!
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Doughnut companies like Krispy Kreme, Duck Donuts, Federal Donuts, Dunkin', and Shipley's are adapting to consumer demands by introducing new flavors, customization options, and healthier alternatives.  Tech-driven automation and delivery services like Uber Eats and DoorDash are also transforming the doughnut experience. Regional chains like Daylight Donuts provide competition and innovation, highlighting the evolving landscape of the doughnut market.

articles.title: Aritzia just released its first self-care collection
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Aritzia and Salt & Stone have collaborated to launch a new self-care product line, Aritzia x Salt & Stone. The collection includes aluminum-free deodorant, gel body wash, body mist, and a coconut-soy wax candle, featuring a limited-edition Lily & Yuzu scent, marking Aritzia's entry into the body care category.

articles.title: 27 Cozy Loungewear Pieces That'll Make You Want To Fast Forward To Cold Weather
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Printfresh offers flannel turkey pajamas for luxurious lounging. Disney Store presents Mickey Mouse waffle lounge pants and a matching top for Disney fans. The COMFY provides a wearable blanket, and Anthropologie features a lounge sweater set. Dearfoams introduces teddy bear slippers for comfortable, cooler days.

articles.title: McDonalds launches veggie burgers again
articles.author: Postmedia News
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched the McVeggie sandwich in Canada. The sandwich features a variety of vegetables, including carrots, green beans, zucchini, peas, soybeans, broccoli, and corn, and is served with shredded lettuce and a choice of creamy or spicy habanero sauce on a toasted sesame seed bun. The McVeggie launch demonstrates McDonald's commitment to serving all guests and evolving tastes.

articles.title: First perfume lotion spray arrives in the Philippines
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Blackwater has launched the BW Women Perfume Lotion Spray in the Philippines. This new Perfume Lotion Spray (PLS) combines skin hydration and long-lasting fragrance. The product is designed for skin hydration and long-lasting fragrance in one spritz.

articles.title: The rise of complex queries is reshaping Google Search. Here's what it means for marketers.
articles.author: Google Ads
articles.summary: Google is launching new AI-powered experiences within Google Search, including AI Mode and AI Overviews, to improve product and service discovery. Google AI Max for Search Campaigns has been updated, advancing beyond keywords and pre-built ads to enhance ad performance. This helps advertisers connect with consumers earlier in their journey.

articles.title: AI's Next Breakthrough: Simplifying Connections through MCP Standardization
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Model Context Protocol (MCP) is introduced as a new standard for AI integration, streamlining communication between AI agents and enterprise systems. It aims to replace bespoke integrations with a standardized method for AI agents to authenticate and execute actions across an organization's technology. The adoption of MCP standardization promises reduced integration costs, faster time to market, and increased innovation.

articles.title: Catsy Unveils AI Based Smart Copy Creation for Industrial Brands
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Catsy has launched "Smart Copy Creation", an AI-based tool for automated product description generation. This feature allows industrial brands to generate product descriptions in bulk across personas, channels, and languages with one click. A leading electrical components manufacturer used Smart Copy to generate 5,000 product descriptions in six languages for their spring catalog launch.

articles.title: "Top tier jester": Merriam-Webster trolls social media with "AI rollout"
articles.author: Anna Good
articles.summary: Merriam-Webster launched the 12th edition of its dictionary on September 25, 2025, adding 5,000 new words like "cold brew" and "rizz", 1,000 new phrases and idioms, enhanced entries, and 20,000 usage examples. The company promoted the launch with a viral video satirizing AI, initially appearing as an announcement for a new "Large Language Model" before revealing the updated dictionary.

articles.title: New 'divisive' Pepsi Max flavour at Tesco that fans 'need to try'
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: PepsiCo launched a limited edition Gingerbread Pepsi Max, a sugar-free spiced drink, in Tesco stores across the UK. The product has received mixed reactions, with some consumers expressing excitement and others remaining skeptical about the flavor combination.

articles.title: People queue for 18 hours for opening of new restaurant
articles.author: 4 minute read
articles.summary: Popeyes UK opened a new restaurant in Swansea on October 3rd, 2025, offering its Louisiana-style menu including the Chicken Sandwich, Signature Wraps, Hot Wings, and Tenders. The restaurant also features a breakfast menu available from 8am to 10am, with a special meal deal offered through the Popeyes UK app.

articles.title: We Tried 9 Ben's Original Microwave Rice Products And Ranked Them
articles.author: Hunter Wren Miele
articles.summary: Ben's Original offers a variety of ready-to-eat rice products, including Ready Rice pouches and quick-cook cups. A ranking of these products was done based on flavor, texture, and convenience, highlighting the Roasted Chicken Flavored Rice cup as the top choice due to its ideal texture and flavor profile reminiscent of chicken noodle soup. The Lemon & Herb Flavored Ready Rice stood out for its unique and enjoyable taste.

articles.title: OpenAI enters a special new phase of extreme influence
articles.author: Alistair Barr
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced AI-powered workplace tools for sales, customer support, and contract analysis, impacting SaaS providers like HubSpot and Salesforce. They also announced Sora, an AI-generated video service, which could disrupt digital advertising and impact platforms like Snap and Pinterest. Furthermore, OpenAI launched Instant Checkout for ChatGPT, partnering with Etsy to enable direct purchases within the chatbot interface.

articles.title: Amal Clooney : son virage mode décrypté en 4 looks
articles.author: Margot Blaise
articles.summary: An apparel company intends to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company plans to create profiles of wealthy young parents or couples to target advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: What are ‘dirty drinks'? Here's what new dirty soda from Mountain Dew tastes like
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: Mountain Dew, in collaboration with PepsiCo, is launching a "Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda" flavor, combining Mountain Dew's original citrus flavor with cream soda. According to PepsiCo, this new product leverages innovation to engage fans and elevate the dirty soda trend. The new flavor is scheduled to be available in early 2026.

articles.title: Epic Games launches webshop service on PC and mobile
articles.author: Games Industry
articles.summary: Epic Games has launched its Epic Web Shops service, catering to PC and mobile platforms.

articles.title: Built In Bharat, For World: What Zoho, Vembu Teach Us About Swadeshi & Atmanirbharta
articles.author: Aditya Pittie
articles.summary: Zoho provides an integrated work operating system that includes CRM, finance, HR, analytics, collaboration, email, service desks, low-code platforms, and developer tools. Furthermore, Zoho's privacy-first messaging app Arattai has gained interest, and Zoho Show has evolved into a presentation tool with features like elegant themes, live collaboration, and seamless publishing.

articles.title: Midea Purifier Ganges Feast 2025: Smart Manufacturing in the Spotlight
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Midea, a Chinese tech giant, launched the "Ganges River Water Purification Cooking Feast" challenge to demonstrate the capabilities of its self-developed water purifier. The challenge involved purifying Ganges River water and using it to prepare a feast, showcasing the purifier's ability to remove harmful substances and provide clean water. Midea also donated the purifiers to the local community, providing access to safe drinking water.

articles.title: With a Friend like this, who needs enemies?
articles.author: Victoria Song
articles.summary: Friend, a $129 AI necklace wearable companion, is launched as an always-on device. This device listens to conversations and sends push notifications with running commentary through the Friend app, but interactions are limited to short text responses.

articles.title: PDI Accelerates Convenience AI Adoption with MyPDI and New Loyalty Capabilities
articles.author: PDI Technologies
articles.summary: PDI Technologies announced it will spotlight MyPDI, a next-generation loyalty solution, at NACS Show 2025. MyPDI is an AI-powered platform that centralizes operations, integrates analytics, and provides personalized, data-driven experiences for retailers and wholesalers.

articles.title: Zong Introduces AI-Powered Urdu Chatbot for Enhanced Customer
articles.author: Sania Saeed
articles.summary: Zong, a technology innovation company in Pakistan, has launched an AI-powered Urdu chatbot to improve customer experience. This new service allows millions of Zong customers to access support in their native language, making digital interactions more inclusive and convenient.

articles.title: PNY Expands India Footprint with Creative Newtech Partnership for SSDs and DRAM Solutions
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: PNY Technologies partners with Creative Newtech Limited to distribute its SSDs and DRAM in India. This partnership aims to expand PNY's market reach in India, providing consumers and businesses with access to PNY's memory solutions, including high-speed Gen 4 and Gen 5 SSDs, as well as DDR4 and DDR5 DRAM modules.

articles.title: Dyson Drops 2 New Vacuums That Will Make You Feel Like Cleaning Every Day
articles.author: Syazwan Bahri
articles.summary: Dyson has launched two new vacuum cleaners in Malaysia: the V16 Piston Animal, priced at RM4,099, and the PencilVac, priced at RM2,799. The V16 features a Hyperdymium 900W motor and a Floor Cones Sense cleaner head, while the PencilVac is designed for portability with a Hyperdymium 140k motor.

articles.title: Vital new lifesaving message added to Aldi products across the country
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Aldi launched a new website to spread its message.

articles.title: Get in, Loser! Bratz® and Mean Girls™ Clique Up Again for a Totally Fetch Spring ...
articles.author: Caledonian Record
articles.summary: Bratz and Paramount Consumer Products are collaborating to launch a new line of Mean Girls dolls. This new product introduction is a reunion between the two companies.

articles.title: Verizon Business collaborates with GE Vernova to Deliver Utilities Enhanced Grid Modernization ...
articles.author: Verizon Communications
articles.summary: Verizon Business announced that GE Vernova MDS™ Orbit, an industrial wireless platform, is now available on Verizon's network. This combined offering provides utility companies with a secure and flexible solution to modernize and manage their electrical grids, enabling grid operations with performance required for SCADA, automation, and other critical applications.

articles.title: Top York brewery brews another national supermarket listing
articles.author: York Press
articles.summary: Brew York's product has been listed in ASDA supermarkets. This marks a new, broader distribution channel for Brew York through ASDA's service offering.

articles.title: Amazon announces Vega OS, a new operating system for Fire TVs
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has officially announced Vega OS, a new operating system based on Linux, and the Fire TV Stick 4K Select will be the first device to come with Vega OS out of the box. Amazon also unveiled a new Cloud App program to aid developers in porting apps to the new operating system.

articles.title: This Hotel Replaced The Alarm Clock With Something That's Bound To Get You Out Of Bed
articles.author: Parishmita Saikia
articles.summary: Holiday Inn Express is introducing the 'Breakfast Alarm Clock,' a new hotel experience that wakes guests with personalized breakfast scents like coffee, bacon, or blueberry muffins.  This service, inspired by research indicating that pleasant scents improve the wake-up experience for travelers, is launching in Australia, New Zealand, and select hotels in Singapore, Thailand, and Japan starting October 20, 2025.

articles.title: Leaf & Mineral Enters the U.S. Market
articles.author: Leaf
articles.summary: A new Canadian detergent label is being introduced to the United States market. It will soon be available on store shelves and through online retailers.

articles.title: 28 Inexpensive 'Shark Tank' Products That I Guarantee You'll Use All Through Fall, Winter, And Spring
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: Several new products and services are introduced: a plant-based cooking oil solidifier, disposable DrainWigs to prevent shower clogs, bottle-cleaning tablets, a reusable smart notebook with the Rocketbook app, a gift wrap cutter, a liquid plant health starter set, Vibes earplugs to reduce noise, miniature spatulas, a hair-cutting template, vegan matte liquid lipstick, tattoo aftercare salve, and pre-labeled textile recycling bags. Also featuring other products like Scrub Daddy, Stasher food bag, Tik Piks, Saucemoto dip clip, headlight beanie, microwave ramen cooker and Nerdwax.

articles.title: Dry Skin? This 'Holy Grail' Night Cream Is 38% Off on Amazon
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: Onekind Dream Cream Night Moisturizer is promoted as a solution for dry skin, especially during the fall. It features ingredients like shea butter, vitamin E, squalane, and rosehip to combat dullness, fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots. The cream is lightweight, non-greasy, and is currently available at a discount on Amazon.

articles.title: Inyange milk powder now available in supermarkets: Here are the prices
articles.author: Emmanuel Ntirenganya
articles.summary: Inyange Industries has launched its first-ever instant whole milk powder in Rwanda, available in 1kg and 500g sachets. The product, manufactured at Inyange's milk powder plant, is priced at Rwf20,000 per kilo and is intended to serve the domestic market and reduce reliance on imported dairy products.

articles.title: Nottingham Forest FC Partners With Objective 1 as Official Global Partner
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Nottingham Forest Football Club and Object 1, a Dubai-based real estate developer, have announced a global partnership. Object 1's brand will be featured on Nottingham Forest's Academy team shirts and on pitchside LED boards. Both organizations will collaborate on multimedia campaigns showcasing Object 1's developments.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 could be Android phone of the year, if it can get cameras right
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced the upcoming launch of its new flagship phone, the OnePlus 15, featuring the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite 5 chipset. The phone will use aerospace-grade Micro-Arc Oxidation on its metal parts, a 165Hz refresh rate display, and a 7300 mAh Glacier Battery. It will also feature a new image processing system called DetailMax, and it will launch in India around November 13.

articles.title: 等红豆报告结果再赞或砸 LOL
articles.summary: A user utilized OpenAI's ChatGPT to obtain design suggestions for modernizing a photograph by uploading the image and inquiring about improvement strategies. This reflects the use of ChatGPT as a design consultation tool.

articles.title: Samsung W26 Foldable Teaser Confirms China-Only Launch — What Makes It Special?
articles.author: IBTimes UK
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Samsung W26, a special version of its Z Fold7, on October 11. The foldable device will be available in red and black colors.

articles.title: How Strategic Procurement Leaders Can Navigate The AI Tipping Point
articles.author: Spencer Penn
articles.summary: LightSource, an AI-powered strategic sourcing platform, offers solutions for procurement processes. The platform focuses on utilizing Agentic AI to automate complex tasks like sourcing and contract review. Leaders are encouraged to demand data-centric solutions from vendors, enabling proactive, actionable insights and facilitating faster sourcing cycles and reduced spending.

articles.title: My gran was born in the 1930s but still barely has a wrinkle, all thanks to a £8 cream she's used since she was 16
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
org: Asia Pacific Journal of Clinical Nutrition
articles.summary: Alol, an 88-year-old, maintains youthful skin by using Pond's Cold Cream since age 16. This product, available for £8.49 on Amazon, is promoted for deep hydration and smooth skin, potentially offering an affordable anti-aging solution.

articles.title: My gran was born in the 1930s but still barely has a wrinkle, all thanks to a £8 cream she's used since she was 16
articles.summary: Pond's Cold Cream, priced at £8.49 on Amazon, is highlighted as a beauty secret. The cream is said to provide deep hydration for smooth, soft radiant skin. Alol, a youthful 88-year-old, swears by Pond's Cold Cream, using it since she was 16.

articles.title: Philippines Unveils Halal-Certified Cosmetics for Global Market
articles.author: parniani
org: Department of Science and Technology–Industrial Technology Development Institute
articles.summary: The Philippines' DOST-ITDI has developed a new line of halal-certified cosmetics and personal care products, including items like moisturizing lipstick, lip balm, and hair-growth shampoo. Three products under the Shahin brand are already FDA-approved, halal-certified, and available in the market. This initiative aims to expand the country's presence in the $47 billion global halal cosmetics market and supports the Philippine Halal Export Development and Promotion Act of 2016.

articles.title: Amazon Launches 'Add to Delivery' Feature for Prime Members in the US
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Amazon has launched 'Add to Delivery', a new feature for US Prime members, allowing them to add eligible products to existing orders before they ship through the Amazon Shopping app or the mobile version of Amazon.com. This feature eliminates the need for separate orders for forgotten items, adding convenience without extra shipping charges. It is available for deliveries scheduled later the same day or the next day for items under select categories such as electronics, clothing, books, and groceries.

articles.title: Simple Face Wash vs. Popular Indian Cleansers: A Comparison
articles.summary: Simple face wash is presented as a gentle and transparent cleanser suitable for all skin types, particularly sensitive skin, due to its natural formula. It is available online and positioned as a better option compared to brands like Himalaya, Clean & Clear, and Ponds, which may contain irritants or be unsuitable for certain skin types.

articles.title: Mira Murati's Lab Launches Innovative AI Tinker Tool: Handy but Not a Game-Changer
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Thinking Machines Lab (TML) launched its first product, Tinker, an API designed for fine-tuning language models. Tinker is currently in private beta and offers a managed service for researchers and developers, running on TML's internal clusters and training infrastructure. It utilizes LoRA to lower costs and facilitate efficient fine-tuning.

articles.title: Prodapt Launches BOLDEST, an AI-Infused Creative Agency
articles.author: Ht Brand Studio
articles.summary: Prodapt has launched BOLDEST, a new entity focused on delivering data-rich, AI-infused digital experiences for brands. BOLDEST blends AI and human creativity to build solutions and includes advisory services, agentic brand engagement, and bold experiences to help companies with omnichannel orchestration and creative design grounded in AI.

articles.title: Amazon Users Can Now Add Last Minute Items To Their Completed Order Before Shipping
articles.summary: Amazon is launching the 'Add To Delivery' feature for Prime members in the United States, allowing them to add items to existing orders before they ship. This new feature, available via the Amazon Android app and Amazon.com for select product categories, aims to enhance user convenience and eliminate the need for separate orders for forgotten items without incurring additional shipping charges.

articles.title: Mira Murati's Thinking Machines Lab Unveils New AI Tinker Product Which Is Useful But Not A Big-Time Blockbuster
articles.author: Lance Eliot
articles.summary: Thinking Machines Lab (TML), co-founded by Mira Murati, launched its first product, Tinker, on October 1, 2025. Tinker is a service that enables AI developers to fine-tune large language models (LLMs) using LoRA via an API. Currently in private beta, Tinker allows selected users to access and use its LoRA implementation for free.

articles.title: Get 4 Amazon Hygiene Hand Soaps for Just €3.42: A Bargain Cleaning Deal!
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal on Amazon Basics Hand Soap, a pack of four for €3.42, which is less than €0.86 per bottle. This hygiene-focused soap is formulated for effective cleaning and is available on Amazon.com. The deal provides substantial savings compared to supermarket brands.

articles.title: 45 Products From Amazon That'll Have You Hitting The "Buy Now" Button *Fast*
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Neutrogena launched Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30, a dual-purpose product for skin protection and skincare. The Pink Stuff introduced "Sqeezy" sponge set for tough cleaning projects. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides, to nourish and hydrate skin for 24 hours.

articles.title: Great Wall Lunch Drop: Meituan Drones Deliver Food To Tourists At Historic Badaling Section
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Meituan, a Chinese delivery giant, has launched a new drone delivery service at the Badaling section of the Great Wall of China. The service operates daily from 10 AM to 4 PM, delivering packages weighing up to 2.3 kilograms for a cost of 4 yuan. Meituan claims the drones can cover a distance that would take 50 minutes to walk in just five minutes.

articles.title: La belle bleue : Zara Tindall porte une robe de sa créatrice préférée pour une sortie avec Mike Tindall
articles.author: Isaac Bickerstaff
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. They are working with an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents to target advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Best Honey Scented Beauty Products, Haircare, Fragrance
articles.author: Buzz Feed UK
articles.summary: Philip Kingsley launched Honey Nectar & Peach Elasticizer as a pre-shampoo treatment. Gisou released Honey Milk 5-In-1 Styling Cream and Honey Infused Hair Perfume Wildflower Honey. NUXE introduced Honey Lip Care, and Laura Mercier launched Ambre Vanille Honey Bath.

articles.title: Leveraging AI tools for organizational peak performance in Nigeria
articles.author: Prisca Ndu
articles.summary: Nigerian businesses are adopting AI solutions such as SeamlessHR for payroll automation, Cancel.ai for faster transaction processing, and Carbon/CapitalSage for fraud detection. Additionally, companies like Kreeno Consortium are implementing AI-powered risk management tools like Risk-HR and E-Commander, while GROK by xAI offers AI-assisted capabilities for various professional needs.

articles.title: Amazon now lets Prime members add items to pending orders
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the 'Add to Delivery' feature for US Prime members. This new service allows customers to add items like electronics, clothing, books, and groceries to existing orders that haven't yet shipped, streamlining their shopping experience within the Amazon app and mobile site.

articles.title: Amazon now lets you add last-minute items to your completed order before it ships
articles.summary: Amazon has launched 'Add to Delivery', a new feature for Prime members in the US that allows them to add items to existing orders before they ship. This service aims to enhance shopping convenience by enabling users to include forgotten items in their scheduled deliveries without additional shipping charges.

articles.title: Amazon Launches ‘Price-Conscious' Grocery Brand With Most Products Under $5
articles.author: CNBC.com
articles.summary: Amazon launched a new private-label grocery brand named 'Amazon Grocery', featuring over 1,000 items priced mostly under $5. This new brand unites Amazon's Happy Belly and Amazon Fresh brands under one label, aiming to offer quality grocery items at competitive prices.

articles.title: AI Revolutionizes Marketing: BloggersIdeas Launches Automation Services
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: BloggersIdeas.com has launched AI Automation Services, which will automate marketing tasks, personalize campaigns, reduce costs, and increase efficiency for businesses. This new service aims to provide real-time insights and enhance customer engagement, giving smaller businesses a competitive edge in the digital marketing landscape.

articles.title: Changan PH launches plug-in hybrid Nevo A05 sedan, priced at P1.195-M
articles.summary: Changan Philippines introduced the Nevo A05, a plug-in hybrid sedan, priced at P1.195 million. The Nevo A05 features a 1.5-liter BlueCore engine, an 18.4kWh battery, and advanced driver-assistance systems.

articles.title: Whatsapp reveals more attractive chat and interesting features for phone.
articles.summary: WhatsApp, powered by Meta AI, has launched a suite of new features designed for small businesses. These include dynamic communication tools with live photos, customizable chat themes, expanded sticker packs, a document scanning feature for Android users, and AI-powered backgrounds for virtual presence. These updates aim to enhance customer engagement, brand identity, and streamline business operations.

articles.title: 42 Products You Won't Be Able To Resist Buying
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Eos launched Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, similar to their popular body lotion, to protect skin from bumps and burns. Mielle introduced Rosemary Mint strengthening oil with biotin for hair strengthening and hydration. Nivea released a lightweight gel cream with Q10 to improve skin firmness. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder for instant matte skin. Clinique introduced Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Pink Honey, a counterpart to their OG Black Honey. Catrice has released \"Instant Awake\" Under Eye Brightener, and Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Lilac St. is now offering Original Lashes, and E.l.f's has Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara. Mise En Scene has released Perfect Serum and Medicube is now offering dual-textured toner pads. Megababe launched anti-chafing balm.

articles.title: Britania Industries Launches New Product
articles.author: Kenneth Kazibwe
articles.summary: Britania Allied Industries has launched Britania Cream Biscuits, a new snack product targeted at Uganda's youth. The launch event was held in partnership with Asinatha Foundation's Elevate 360 program, where over 500 students sampled the biscuits.

articles.title: Best-selling robot vacuum brand ECOVACS launches tech-savvy device that is a ‘game-changer' for hard floors
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: ECOVACS has launched the T80 Omni robot vacuum, priced at $2299, featuring Ozmo Roller Mopping Tech. The T80 Omni has a docking station where it self-empties, refills, and disposes of dirty water. The Ecovacs' T80 Omni also features pet hair and anti-tangle technology.

articles.title: Washing machines will run more efficiently if you do 10-second test
articles.author: Sophie Law
articles.summary: Beko UK advises considering washing machine capacity when buying a new machine. Small capacity (7kg) machines are suitable for small families, medium capacity (8kg) suits most families, and larger machines (9-12kg) are ideal for bigger households and bulky items.

articles.title: Best hair dryer
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer is highlighted as a fast-drying option without extreme heat, featuring attachments to reduce flyaway hair. The Revlon Compact Hair Dryer, designed for travel, offers affordability, a cool shot button, and flexible styling. The BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Portofino Hair Dryer uses titanium technology for even heat distribution and features an Italian motor and ergonomic handle.

articles.title: Midea Purifier's "Ganges Feast" Challenge Spotlights Chinese Smart Manufacturing
articles.summary: Midea launched a "Ganges River Water Purification Cooking Feast" challenge to showcase its water purifier's capabilities by purifying Ganges River water and using it to cook a feast. Advantech partnered with Edge Impulse to integrate AI development tools into Advantech's edge computing platforms to enable enterprises to quickly build and deploy AI projects at the edge.

articles.title: America Ferrera Uses the Saie Slip Tint Moisturizer with SPF 35
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Saie launched the Slip Tint Moisturizer with SPF 35, which is praised for its 'glowy' and 'moisturizing' formula, blending makeup and skincare for a natural, radiant finish. The product contains ingredients like hyaluronic acid and licorice root extract, offering hydration and sun protection. Several other tinted moisturizers with SPF from brands like BareMinerals, La Roche-Posay, EltaMD and Laura Mercier are also available.

articles.title: 被48岁的'陈数'惊艳了！穿缎面衬衫+半身裙，时髦又显贵！_手机网易网
articles.author: 冒泡泡的鱼儿
articles.summary: Denza has launched the 2026 Denza N9 model. This announcement was made on NetEase's social media platform, NetEase Hao.

articles.title: Microsoft is building a new OneDrive app for Windows 11 complete with redesigned gallery interface — here's your first look
articles.author: Zac Bowden
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing a new dedicated OneDrive app for Windows 11, featuring a modern web-based interface that prioritizes photo and video viewing alongside file management. The app includes gallery mode, file mode, moments feature, built-in editing tools. The company is holding a special OneDrive event on October 8, so perhaps there will be more information about the new app then.

articles.title: This Low-Profile Eufy Robot Vacuum with a Self-Emptying Bin Is 46% Off
articles.author: Izzy Baskette
articles.summary: Eufy's 11S Max Robot Vacuum, currently discounted on Amazon, offers features like self-charging, obstacle avoidance, and a slim design for cleaning under furniture. It is quieter and more maneuverable than Roombas, with strong suction for various floor types and a 100-minute runtime. Roborock also launched Qrevo Series Robot Vacuum and Mop.

articles.title: Ayala bringing UAE's Spinneys to Philippines
articles.author: Richmond Mercurio
articles.summary: Ayala Corp. is partnering with Spinneys, a UAE-based supermarket chain, to introduce premium fresh food retail to the Philippines. Spinneys will be opening their stores for the first time outside of Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC). Ayala will combine its local market knowledge and Spinneys' operational expertise, as they plan to open premium grocery stores in the capital region.

articles.title: Our 3 Favorite Family-Friendly Bar Soaps
articles.summary: Dove launched a soap-free beauty bar, a crowd-pleaser that remains an affordable favorite. Australian Botanical's Goats Milk Soap impressed testers with its luxurious feel and affordable price, while Dr. Bronner's introduced an All-One Pure-Castile Unscented Magic Bar Soap, lauded for its simplicity and effectiveness.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch Pokémon Legends: Z-A on October 16, 2025. The game will be available exclusively on the Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch systems.

articles.title: Prime Members Can Save $100 Off the iRobot Roomba 104 Robot Vacuum, But Not for Long
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A company is introducing a robot designed to handle cleaning tasks. This new product aims to automate and simplify the cleaning process for users.

articles.title: RAK to develop Wynn Boulevard connecting casino with UAE highways
articles.author: Gulf Business
articles.summary: A project was unveiled during the launch of Marjan Beach.

articles.title: Zoho Arattai vs WhatsApp: What Sets These Messaging Apps Apart?
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Zoho Arattai is being compared to WhatsApp based on their key features. This comparison suggests an analysis of Zoho Arattai's product offerings and functionalities.

articles.title: Your Delivery Robot Is Here
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: DoorDash introduced a new delivery robot. The episode discusses the implications of a growing robot population for humans.

articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Amazon is offering beauty deals ahead of Prime Big Deal Days. This promotion suggests potential discounts or the introduction of new beauty products and services during the upcoming event.

articles.title: Aircross X by Citro�n: Stylish, spacious, and family-friendly SUV in India
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Citroën's Aircross X challenges its rivals with its spacious design, refined features, and aggressive pricing. The Aircross X is positioned to attract buyers from competitors.

articles.title: M&S shoppers say 'cosy' new cardigan is 'perfect for colder weather'
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer launched a new zip-up cardigan. Shoppers describe the cardigan as 'cozy'. The product is already selling out.
